full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS BTZAN MDOS GTONG TSUL DREGS PA MIG BSGYUR GYI LTAD MO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (BTZAN MDOS GTOR TSUL DREGS PA MIGS BSGYUR LTAD MO ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG DUR PED NAS DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA NANG SO SKAL BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYI AU TSUGS MTHA' TSUGS MTHA' SKYES GYIS BSKUL BA'I GA-YAS NGOR MA BZLOG PAR @009A *, ,LTA 'DRE STONG GI DRAG LAS 'BYUNG BTANG SGOR STUN TE KU S'A LI, DHARMA BADZRA GYIS NOR SKYONG RAB BRGAL TSUL DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI GU SHRI NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL GYIS DGYES PA RIS MED YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
